title: Construction Site Material Handling Hazard Awareness Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic construction site work processes
context.additional_context: Practical education focused on smartphone sensor utilization, strengthening safety management competencies in non-face-to-face environments

learning_goals: Learners identify four major risk factors in construction site material handling tasks with 80% accuracy.
Learners apply machine learning models to classify risk scenarios by analyzing smartphone accelerometer/gyroscope data.
Learners execute risk prevention measures in real work environments through a three-step process: recognition, analysis, and response.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
